message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point, but I'm offering it to you first as a valued potential customer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget. Can you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,000 is significantly below its value. I can be flexible, however. How about we settle at $12,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we settle at $12,000?
